column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Since I was by myself
column2: I sat at the full-service bar. The restaurant was quaint with red leather seating
column4: and dimly lit lights and chandeliers. Just about every seat was taken on a cold Wednesday night and there was lots of activity. The bartender who attended me
column6: was very attentive and responsive and made me feel right at home.
